title: Normal Draft? ever?
body:
Riot,
 it's been YEARS the server isn't going to significantly get any bigger. Can we have normal draft yet? like seriously. It's pretty damn stupid and just outright disrespectful.

I'm sick of playing normals where people play the cancer new champs. AND YOU CAN'T DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT

replies.body:
remove teambuilder, add normal draft.

problem solved.

the game is designed and balanced around draft pick... how are you supposed to practise for ranked games when there is nothing with the same ruleset and balance?

edit: and teambuilder is a dead queue anyway.
All problems fixed with Team Builder, where you wait a shit load of hours to play a fun game.
I hear you, buddy. That and Dominion... it seems like it's not going to happen, though. Best move to America. {{champion:32}}
Normal draft sounds fun, however draft picking isn't slotted under "casual" play
